ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: View others' personal information (e.g., profiles, photo albums)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Read friends' news posts (e.g., Facebook feed stories, WeChat moments)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Read comments on friends' or one's own posts
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Listen to music or watch soap operas or movies
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Initiate online entertainment events (e.g., team video game, online singing contest)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Initiate online interest-based events (e.g., sports, music, politics)

During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Send invitations of online entertainment events (e.g., team video game, online singing contest)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Send invitations of online interest-based events (e.g., sports, music, politics)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Write comments under topics of your interest (e.g., sports, music, politics)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Interact with members in internet-based discussion groups (e.g., sports, music, politics)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Remix, mash-up, or add to one another's works in ongoing media-enabled conversations
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Modify others' works (e.g., video spoofs from imitating)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Create audio/video/photographs (e.g., on YouTube)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Create or modify computer or video games

During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Create digital art content (e.g., designing virtual clothing or furniture items) in virtual social worlds (e.g., on Second Life)

During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Write on topics of personal interest or experience (e.g., game-playing, traveling, arts, photography)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Repost friends' posts on social networking sites
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Forward entertainment information (e.g., entertainment news, video spoofs)

During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Forward public promotion information (e.g., events information, activity publicity, product advertisement)
During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Share content of topics in my interest areas (e.g., sports, music, politics)

During the past week, how often have you engaged in the following social media activities outside of school?: Share links or video from knowledge collaborative communities or interest-based groups (e.g., on Quora)
